channel.title: I need help badly please someone
channel.description: when i logg on to a server and their personalized main menu comes up i automatically lose my connection? how do i stop this from happening? please someone im desperate

this happens to me and players on my server, it usually disconnects you the first time you log in after a whil right? then it connects you. Its a bad connection, i posted this once before
